plotting¶

ssv.plotting.convert_lines_to_dataframe(lines, wavelength_column='wavelength', name_column='name', output_wavelength_unit=Unit('nm'), wavelength_min=0, wavelength_max=1e+99)¶

Converts the spectral lines astropy QTable in the required format to the pandas DataFrame format used by altair.

lines | astropy.QTable

QTable must have columns for spectral line name and wavelength

wavelength_column

Column title for the line wavelengths in lines

name_column

Column title for the line names in lines

output_wavelength_unit | astropy.Unit

Converts the wavelength values to be in these units in the returned DataFrame

wavelength_min

Defines a minimum bound for which spectral lines will be included in the returned DataFrame

wavelength_max

Defines a maximum bound for which spectral lines will be included in the returned DataFrame

Returns

DataFrame with columns for spectral line names and wavelengths

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

ssv.plotting.convert_spectrum_to_dataframe(label, spectrum, *, output_wavelength_unit=Unit('nm'), show_variance=False)¶

Converts the astropy QTable in the required format to the pandas DataFrame format used by altair.

label

Label used to group the data

spectrum | specutils.Spectrum1D

Spectrum1D object used to fill out the returned DataFrame

output_wavelength_unit | astropy.Unit

Converts the wavelength values to be in these units in the returned DataFrame

show_variance

Include the column for variance in the output DataFrame

Returns

DataFrame with columns for wavelength, flux, variance (optionally) and the label

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

ssv.plotting.plot_lines(lines_df, *, style=None, output_wavelength_unit=Unit('nm'), wavelength_column='wavelength', name_column='name', wavelength_axis_label='Wavelength')¶

Plots spectral lines

Parameters

  • lines_df – Pandas DataFrame containing the data necessary to plot the spectral lines

  • style – Used to style the marks in the Chart

  • wavelength_column – Title for the wavelength column in lines_df

  • name_column – Title for the name column in lines_df

  • wavelength_axis_label – Title for the wavelength axis of the Chart

Returns

  • altair.Chart – Plot of the spectral lines in lines_df

  • altair.Chart – Plot used to label the lines with their names

plugin_collection¶

class ssv.plugin_collection.Plugin¶

Bases: object

Base class that each plugin must inherit from. within this class you must define the methods that all of your plugins must implement

perform_operation(argument)¶

The method that we expect all plugins to implement. This is the method that our framework will call

reduce(argument)¶

The method that we expect all plugins to implement. This is the method that our framework will call

class ssv.plugin_collection.PluginCollection(plugin_package)¶

Bases: object

Upon creation, this class will read the plugins package for modules that contain a class definition that is inheriting from the Plugin class

apply_all_plugins_on_value(argument)¶

Apply all of the plugins on the argument supplied to this function

apply_plugin_on_value(pluginname, argument)¶
apply_reduce_on_plugin(pluginname, argument)¶
reload_plugins()¶

Reset the list of all plugins and initiate the walk over the main provided plugin package to load all available plugins

walk_package(package)¶

Recursively walk the supplied package to retrieve all plugins

Return a function used to smooth an input spectrum

Parameters

  • smoothing_width (int, optional) – Width of the smoothing kernel, by default 5

Returns

Takes a spectrum and returns a spectrum smoothed with the specified smoothing function

function
